description_html:
Named for Piazza del Campo in Sienna, Italy, the ROHL Italian Bath Campo series celebrates the famous systems of conduits that bring water to the area. In the 14th century miles of tunnels and aqueducts were built, delivering water to the famous Font Gaia – or Fountain of the World. The Campo handle and escutcheon design emulate the valve/stem combination used in the building of industrial conduit systems. Authentically crafted in Piemonte, Italy.

• Fixed spout
• 8" centers
• 5 29/32" overall spout height
• 3 x 1 3/8" cutouts
• 1/4-turn ceramic disc control cartridges
• 6 11/16" spout reach
• 1/2" NPT connectors
• Matching tub filler A3314IW
• 1.2 GPM

Available Finishes: Polished Chrome, Polished Nickel, Satin Nickel and Tuscan Brass
product_name: ROHL Italian Campo Widespread Lavatory Faucet
